1.name: Alchemist
1.description: The ALCHEMIST specializes in powerful buffing Vials and consumable potency.
1.unlock: Get grabbed by the manticora when you get close to a drain. It will grab you to it's lair.

2.name: Archon
2.description: The Archon is the master of Weapon Mods and Mod Power generation
2.unlock: First you need to ding a locked door at The Labyrinth, to open it you need the Master Portal Key found at the Labyrinth and being with the Status CORRUPTED.

3.name: Challenger
3.description: The CHALLENGER specializes in close range combat and heightened survivability.
3.unlock: Buy from Reggie at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

4.name: Engineer
4.description: The ENGINEER specializes in Heavy Weaponry which can be carried or placed in turret mode.
4.unlock: Found on the ground in a toxic and foggy area near the Titan's Reach world stone. You will need some healing and status resistances.

5.name: Explorer
5.description: The EXPLORER spcializes in finding valuable items and overall team utility

6.name: Gunslinger
6.description: The GUNSLINGER specializes in raw damage, firearm handling, and ammo conservation.
6.unlock: Exahust dialoge with Mudtooth after finishing the second world

7.name: Handler
7.description: The HANDLER specializes in teamwork in both solo and cooperative scenarios.
7.unlock: Buy from Mudtooth at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

8.name: Hunter
8.description: The HUNTER specializes in ranged damage, precision shots and marking enemies.
8.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

9.name: Invader
9.description: The INVADER specializes elusiveness nad misdirecting the enemy's focus
9.unlock: Use the Dreamcatcher weapon on a blue sparkle stone to get Walker's Dream. Use it, the defeat Bane Boss.

10.name: Medic
10.description: The MEDIC specializes in survivability with enhanced healing and Relic effectiveness.
10.unlock: Buy from Dr. Norah at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

11.name: Summoner
11.description: The SUMMONER specializes in using Minions to do their bidding and sacrificing them.
11.unlock: Buy the Faded Grimoire it from the Bloodmoon Altar.

19.name: Kinship
19.description: Reduces friendly fire damage dealt and received

25.name: Triage
25.description: Increases healing provided by Weapon Mods

28.name: Arcane Strike
28.description: Increases Mod Power Generation for Melee Damage
28.unlock: Defeat a miniboss that spawns in the bone piles

29.name: Barkskin
29.unlock: Talk to Meidre, depends on your answers being "helping the others

30.name: Blood Bond
30.description: Summon Absorb damage taken by the caster

31.name: Bloodstream
31.unlock: Talk to Meidre, depends on your answers being "helping myself

33.name: Footwork
33.unlock: Complete the train quest where you face waves of enemies on a train.

34.name: Glutton
34.description: Increases the Use Speed of Consumables and Relics

36.name: Recovery
36.unlock: Bring all the child to the Oracle's Refuge.

38.name: Revivalist
38.description: Increases the Speed of Reviving and being Revived

39.name: Rugged
39.description: Increases the Health of Archetpye Summons
39.unlock: Free the Pan that is imprissioned by Root Nexus

41.name: Shadeskin
41.description: Increases Resistance to Elemental Status Effect Damage

42.name: Siphoner
42.unlock: Complete the Quarantine Event where you need to eliminate all enemies in the area in 6 minutes.

53.name: Chicago Typewriter
53.unlock: Find the Biome Portal Key in The Labyrinth and use it on the door hidden in it. To reach it you need to find a portal and jump to the one behind it, enter the next one and enter in the opening in the wall to your left, do some parkour and at the end it will be the door that lead you to Ward 13 Leto's Stash.

54.name: Crossbow
54.unlock: Imperial Gardens puzzle, there are some symbols in the area but the pattern seems always the same.

56.name: Pulse Rifle
56.unlock: Found after using the Decorum Cipher to unlock the door downstairs in Abyssal Rift, in the area where The Custodian resides. The Decorum Cipher can be found in the train after finishing the quest of Terminus Station.

57.name: Royal Hunting Bow
57.unlock: Win a game to the Postulant

59.name: Aphelion
59.unlock: Crafted by McCabe after giving her the Void Cinder

60.name: Crescent Moon
60.unlock: You need to use the Dreamcatcher while Nimue is sleeping, use the Dreamcatcher on her to get Nimue's Dream. Use it and you get teleported to an open area, walk to the light until you see a blue orb that is the Anamy's Echo

62.name: Merciless
62.unlock: Kill The Ravager if you killed him after eating The Doe

64.name: Plasma Cutter
64.unlock: Wear the Navigator's Helm, obtained by killing a Zombie wearing the Helm, and run the face recognition to open the door.

66.name: Twisted Arbalest
66.unlock: Kill the Corruptor while the golem is still alive

73.name: Double Barrel
73.unlock: Inside the safe. You need to give the woman in the basement 3 little statues to give you the code. 2971

75.name: Star Shot
75.unlock: From the coffins in the ground using the big facility you need to power first the Dark Conduit area.

77.name: MP60-R
77.unlock: Examine the flashlight Ford gave you with the code 0415. Put that code on the chest in Ward 13, take the key and go all way to north past some shipping containers. Open the locked door with the key.

78.name: Sorrow
78.unlock: Give Meidra the Tear of Kaeula. You can find the Tear of Kaeula ring in Yaesha → Kaeula's Rest

79.name: Enigma
79.unlock: When the teleporter that changes location appear on a fall jump 2 seconds before it opens i will lead you to an invisible platform.

82.name: Hellfire
82.unlock: From the first checkpoint, before falling into the gap, turn back to the big open area. You will find an aground truck, You can climb on one of the sides. Below, you will find Hellfire

85.name: Rune Pistol
85.unlock: Crafted at Nimue, the material can be found in Losomn

96.name: Ornate Blade
96.unlock: Accuse the right Conspirator. Go to the mirror world and get the dagger, when you got it inspect it and accuse the same symbol as the daggers has in it's pommel.

97.name: Atom Smasher
97.unlock: Inside the train as you end the quest

99.name: Royal Broadsword
99.unlock: When talking to the queen fight them and let them kill you.

100.name: Dreamcatcher
100.unlock: Give the Nightweaver idol to the Nightweaver's Web

102.name: Atom Splitter
102.unlock: Inside the Hatchery there are some roboty arms that lift a platform that let you reach another one, jump just in time to avoid death.

103.name: Spectral Blade
103.unlock: Defeat Sha'Hala: Spectral Guardian of N'erud

104.name: Blade of Gul
104.unlock: Buy from Bloodmoon Altar for 10 Bloodmoon Essence

105.name: Bone Chopper
105.unlock: Use one of the small lifts after completing The Feast Event to find it in a room.

106.name: Ornate Flail
106.unlock: You have to take the secret passage in The Executioner Event. To enter this event you need to shoot a painting that you find when your character says "something's odd

107.name: Rebellion Spear
107.unlock: Starting weapon for the Summoner Archetype

112.name: Assasin's Dagger
112.unlock: Crafted by Nimue giving her the Assasin Dagger

113.name: Feral Judgement
113.unlock: Kill the Corrupted Ravager kill after you are offered the pact.

116.name: Nightshade
116.unlock: Alt Kill Nightweaver. Have to destroy her heart when she lets it out to obtain this drop.

118.name: Stonebreaker
118.unlock: Defeat the Corruptor while the golem is dead.

119.name: Hotshot
119.description: Imbues ammunition with FIRE and increases Ranged damage by 15% for 20.3s. Shots also apply BURNING, dealing 300.8 FIRE Damage over 10s. Mod Power Req: 1250

120.name: Healing Shot
120.description:
Launches a payload that explodes on cotact with allies, healing 35% of their max health. When no ally is struck, payload lays dormant until an ally gets close. Dorman payload lasts 30s slowly losing healing potency over time.
Mod Power Req: 600

121.name: Concussive Shot
121.description:
Fires a focused blast of air through all targets within 8m dealing 155 damage and 4x impact.
Mod Power Req: 450

122.name: Scrap Shot
122.description:
Fires a caltrops grenade that explodes to cover area of 6m. Caltrops deal 20 damage per second and apply SLOW to enemies that walk over them. Lasts 10s.
Mod Power Req: 750

123.name: Bore
123.description: Fires a drill projectile, dealing 80 damage. After burrowing into an enemy, creates a Weakspot which grants 50% of normal Weakspot Damage on hit. If attached to an existing Weakspot Ranged Crit Chance is increased by 15% when attacking the drill. Last 6s. Mod Power Req: 500

124.name: Voltaic Rondure
124.description:
Launches a slow-moving orb that pulses every 0.5s, striking enemies within 3m for 20s SHOCK damage and applying OVERLOADED for 15s. The orb lasts 20s. The orb can be overcharged by striking it with additional damage.
Mod Power Req: 850

125.name: Space Crabs
125.description:
Launch an alien egg that bursts on impact, releasing 5 Space Crabs. Crabs follow the caster, leaping towards the enemies within 4m, and exploding, dealing 60 Damage each.
Mod Power Req: 450

126.name: Prismatic Driver
126.description:
Fires a superheated beam which deals 25 Mod Damage per second. Sustaining the beam on a target causes an explosion which deals 150 Mod damage in a 3m AOE.
Mod Power Req: 50 Per Pulse

127.name: Tremor
127.description:
Fires a projectile that cracks the ground and spawns shockwaves that deal 75 damage within 9m for 6s. Shockwaves inflict 3x impact.
Mod Power Req: 900

128.name: Fargazer
128.description:
Calls froth an eye of Legion to gaze at player's AIM target. For every 0.25s Fargazer focuses on a traget within 25m, a stack of MADNESS Status is applied for 5s. Each stack deals 3 Damage per second. Max 10 stacks. Lasts 30s.
Mod Power Req: 1250

129.name: Witchfire
129.description:
Fires a highly volatile projectile that explodes to leave a line of flaming terrain. Deals 55 FIRE damage per second, and applies BURNING, dealing 200 damage over 10s. Lasts 5s.
Mod Power Req: 750

130.name: Rotted Arrow
130.description:
Fires a rotten arrow that deals 19.8 damage and detonates for another 60 damage within 4m. A deadly gas cloud is left behind that deals 200 damage over 5s.
Mod Power Req: 400

131.name: Overflow
131.description:
Imbues ammunition with SHOCK and increases Fire Rate by 15% and Reload Speed by 15% for 20s. Shots also apply OVERLOADED, dealing 87.5 SHOCK Damage every 5s for 15s.
Mod Power Req: 1250

132.name: Soulbinder
132.description:
Fires a projectile that attaches to the enemy dealing 40 damage. Enemies within 7m become bound to the primary target after impact and share 60% of damage dealt to them. Lasts 15s.
Mod Power Req: 650
132.unlock__1: Compleating the quest reaching the bottom of the Chimney

133.name: Time Lapse
133.description:
Creates a 6m blast which freezes all standard enemies for 7s. Dealing damage to frozen enemies immediately breaks the Time Lapse effect, applying SLOW for the remaining duration.
Mod Power Req: 1,000
133.unlock__1: Need to find the piece found in Lemark District, by using the same clock hour that the clock in Hewdas Clock. Then fix the clock in Hewdas Clock.

134.name: Firestorm
134.description:
Creates a whirling cyclone that sucks in nearby targets and applies BURNING for 10s. The center of the Cyclone deals 75 FIRE damage per second. Lasts 15s.
Mod Power Req: 1,250

135.name: Helix
135.description:
Shoots a helix of missiles, dealing 120 damage. On contact, divides into 6 smaller rockets which seek additional targets, dealing 30 damage on contact.
Mod Power Req: 850

136.name: Astral Burst
136.description:
Fires a short range burst of 7 star fragments which deal 35 damage each. Fragments bounce off walls up to 3 times, dealing 35% additional damage per bounce. Weakspot hits deal reduced damage.
Mod Power Req: 450
136.unlock__1: From the entrance, the triangle lever should be triggered until the triangle is facing left. The icons lever should be triggered until the doe is in front of you. The circles lever should be triggered until the Ravager, doe and death are encircled with the doe having two circles.

137.name: Blood Draw
137.description:
Shoots out razor-sharp Chain Shards which impale up to 5 targets within 15m, dealing 10 damage. On hit, chains are pulled towards the caster, dealing 250 damage split equally among enemies and applying 275 BLEEDING damage over 15s.
Mod Power Req: 450
137.unlock__1: Pay the tribute to the Red Prince

138.name: Bore
138.description:
Fires a drill projectile which bores into enemies on contact, dealing 80 damage. After fully burrowing into an enemy, creates a Weakspot which grants 50% of normal Weakspot Damage on hit. If attached to an existing Weakspot, Ranged Crit Chance is increased by 15% when attacking the drill. Lasts 6s.
Mod Power Req: 500

139.name: Corrosive Rounds
139.description:
Imbues ammunition with TOXIC and increases Range Crit Chance by 15% for 20s. Shots also apply CORRODED, dealing 150 damage over 10s.
Mod Power Req: 1250

140.name: Defrag
140.description:
Infects weapon with Malware for 30s, causing shots to apply FRAGMENTED for 5s. When a FRAGMENTED enemy dies, they create a Glitch that lasts 5s.
Picking up a Glitch increases All damage by 20% for 5s.
Destroying a Glitch causes it to destabilize, creating a 5m Virus Pool which deals 25 damage per second and applies the FRAGMENTED debuff to enemies inside. Virus Pools last 15s.
Mod Power Req: 1500

141.name: Energy Wall
141.description:
Deploys an energy barrier on impact with ground. Allies can shoot through Energy Wall but enemy projectiles are absorbed (up to 500 damage received). Max 1 Wall at a time. Lasts 30s.
Mod Power Req: 500

142.name: Familiar
142.description:
Summons Faerie Familiar to aid in combat. The Familiar selects a random enemy within 10m and slashes through them for 25 damage each attack. Familiar will select a new target when the previous one dies. Lasts 25s.
Mod Power Req: 500

143.name: Root Blades
143.description:
Fires a volley of Root Blades in an arc which each deal 25 Damage and apply 200 BLEEDING damage over 10s
Mod Power Req: 750

144.name: Rootlash
144.description:
Launches a projectile which summons a Root Tentacle. Tentacles deal 30 damage and steal 1.5% of the hero's Max Health per hit. Lasts 20s. (Max 2)
Mod Power Req: 450

145.name: Skewer
145.description:
Fires a Wretched Spear which embeds itself on contact. Spears deal 150 damage on hit, rapidly dividing inside the target until bursting, dealing 350 damage to all targets within 3m. Spears embedded in the environment remain in place for 10s.
Mod Power Req: 500

146.name: Song of Eafir
146.description:
Fires a shot infused with the binding power of the Song of Eafir. Deals massive impact to all enemies in 10m and deals additional damage to Flying enemies. The song continues for 15s, afflicting targets within 15m with SLOW, and a 15% decrease to damage dealt.
Mod Power Req: 1000

147.name: Stasis Beam
147.description:
Fires a beam which deals 15 damage per second, and applies SLOW Debuff. After 3s of application to a target, SLOW becomes STASIS, freezing the target in place for 10s.
Mod Power Req: 50 per Pulse.

148.name: Transpose
148.description:
Picking up Ammo increases Ranged damage by 10% for 20s. 
Level 10: Ammo pickups are added directly to the magazine.
148.unlock: Buy from Dwell or Defeating W.D. 109

149.name: Feedback
149.description:
Using this weapon's Mod generates 10% of single charge value as passive Mod Power over 10s. Does not stack.
Level 10: Mod Damage generates 10% of damage dealt as Mod Power.

150.name: Harmonizer
150.description:
Increases Mod Damage by 10%. 
Level 10: Generate 25% additional Mod Power for Stowed Weapon.

151.name: Resentment
151.description:
Gain 10% Melee Damage when Grey Health is present. 
Level 10: Reduces Stagger by 1 when using any Melee Attack.

152.name: Shield Breaker
152.description:
Melee Attacks grant a Shield for 2% of Max Health. Max 20%. Last 10s. 
Level 10: Charged Melee Attacks consume all Shield to increase damage of next strike by 1% per Shield Consumed. Max 100%.

153.name: Slayer
153.description:
Reloading increases the damage of this weapon's next shot by 10%. Lasts 3s. 
Level 10: Increases Reload Speed by 15%.

154.name: Weaponlord
154.description:
Basic Melee Attack increase the next Charge Attack by 7%. Max 5 Stacks. 
Level 10: At Max Stacks, the next Charge Attack gains 100% Critical Chance.

155.name: Dervish
155.description:
Increases Melee Damage by 20% for 10s when activating a Skill. 
Level 10: Melee kills reduce Skill Cooldowns by 5%. Can trigger once every 5s.

156.name: Deadly Calm
156.description:
Continuosly Aiming increases Ranged Damage by up to 10% over 3s. 
Level 10: Ranged Critical Hit Chance increased by 10%.

157.name: Battery
157.description:
Ranged Hits increase the next Weakspot Hit by 10% per stack. Max 5 Stacks. 
Level 10: At Max Stacks, the next Weakspot Hit deals 15% additional damage over 3s.

158.name: Timewave
158.description:
Mod Use applies SLOW status on all enemies within 7.5m for 3.5s.
Level 10: Increase this weapon's Ranged damage by 15% to enemies inflicted with SLOW status.

159.name: Refunder
159.description:
Shots from this weapon have 20% chance to return spent Ammo to reserves.
Level 10: Refunded Ammo has a 50% chance to also be added to stowed weapon reserves.

160.name: Momentum
160.description:
When this weapon scores a Critical hit, it increases Critical Chance and Critical Damage by 1.5% for 3s. Max 10 stacks.
Level 10: Critical Hits from this weapon add 2 stacks. Increases duration by 2s.

161.name: Lithely
161.description:
Increase this weapon's Reload Speed by 4% for each enemy killed between reloads. Lasts 15s. Max 5 Stacks.
Level 10: Reloading at Max Stacks increases Ranged Damage by 20% for 15s.

162.name: Striker
162.description:
Melee Hits increase Melee Damage by 3% for 10s. Max 5 Stacks.
Level 10: Increases Movement Speed by 3% per stack.

163.name: Extender
163.description:
Increases Magazine Capacity of this weapon by 30%.
Level 10: Increases Reload Speed of this weapon by 15%

164.name: Bandit
164.description:
On hit, grants 10% chanche to return spent Ammo directly into the magazine of this weapon.
Level 10: When Ammo is returned to this weapon, it gains 10% increased Fire Rate for 3s. Duration can increase up to 10s
164.unlock: Defeat The Weald Stalker and The Gnarled Archer killed in this order

165.name: Reinvigorate
165.description:
Reduces Stamina Cost of all Charged Melee Attacks by 25%.
Level 10: Melee Charge Attacks gain 15% additional damage and 10% Critical Chance.
165.unlock: Defeat Defiler Boss that spawns after killing Nexus Root with the imprissioned Pan

167.name: Blooming Heart
167.description: On use, heals the user for 35% of caster's Max Health over 5s. Spawns 3 Healing Orbs which grant 35% of caster's Max Health over 5s. Orbs last 20s. Recasting removes previous Orbs

168.name: Crystal Heart
168.description: On use, regenerates 100% of Max Health over 10s. Movement Speed is reduced by 50% and damage incoming is reduced by 25%. Lasts 10s.
168.unlock: Reach the final area and turn the facility on.

169.name: Decayed Heart
169.description: On use, causes the next 3 instances of enemy damage taken to trigger 40 Health regeneration over 3s. Lasts 30s.

170.name: Enlarged Heart
170.description: Innate Double Use Speed. One use, heals 140 Health over 0.5s. Relic capacity is halved

171.name: Lifeless Heart
171.description: On use, heals 30 Health over 0.5s. Relic capacity is doubled

172.name: Pulsing Heart
172.description: On use, pulses every 3s, healing allies within 7m for 23 Health over 0.5s per pulse. Lasts 15s.

173.name: Quilted Heart
173.description: Does not provide standard healing. On use, negates Stamina Drain and cause Evades to heal for 15 Health over 0.25s. Lasts 20s.

174.name: Reprocessed Heart
174.description: On use, converts 5 Health as Grey Health to 40 Mod Power per second for 25s for both weapons. Cannot die from conversion.

175.name: Resonating Heart
175.description: On use, regenerates 50% of Max Health over 5s. When heal ends, any overhealed Health is Doubled and awarded over the next 20s

176.name: Ripened Heart
176.description: On.use, heals 35 Health over 0.5s and an additional 70 over 5s.

177.name: Runed Heart
177.description: On use, increases Health Regeneration by 5 and generates 500 Mod Power over 10s for both weapons.

178.name: Salvaged Heart
178.description: Innate 50% Use Speed bonus. On use, heals 30 Health over 0.25s and restore 300% of current Grey Health.
178.unlock: Crafted at Drzyr Replicator. 10 Lumenite Crystal, 15 Relic Dust, 1500 Scrap

179.name: Shielded Heart
179.description: On use, grants a SHIELD for 100% of Max Health. Lasts 20s or until SHIELD is removed by damage.
179.unlock:
Find your way to the back of a statue that is located at the hall where E.D. Alpha is encountered to insert a Stellar-Powered Cell at the back of the statue, it's not reachable from the ground. You must make your way around to a higher level around the backside area of the statue, find an elevator, trigger it to go up but don't jump on it, it will reveal a hole underneath, jump down to access the slot and insert a Stellar-Powered Cell.
This will open a door on the side of the main hall, go through it.

180.name: Siphon Heart
180.description: On use, grants 10% of base damage dealt as Lifesteal for 10s.

181.name: Tormented Heart
181.description: Innate 20% Use Speed bonus. On use, deals 240 Explosive damage to enemies within 10m and Lifesteals 25% of damage dealt.

182.name: Tranquil Heart
182.description: Passively grants 2 Health Regeneration per second. On use, doubles All Health Regeneration for 15s.
182.unlock: Crafted by giving Nimue a Tormented Heart

183.name: Unsullied Heart
183.description: On use, heals for 100% of Current Health over 0.5s.

184.name: Void Heart
184.description: On use, reduces incoming damage by 50% for 4s. When buff ends, heals 100% of missing Health over 0.75s.

185.name: Emergency Switch
185.description: When below 50% Health, chance to consume Relic on use is reduced by 35%. Final Relic Charge is not consumed on use, but effect cannot be triggered again for 60s.

186.name: Samoflange
186.description: Direct damage taken from enemies, and any additional damage within 2s, is reduced by 50%. Once the defensive buff expires, all incoming damage to wearer is increased by 15% for 10s.
186.unlock: After collecting two Stellar-Powered Cells you will be able to open a new path an elevator that takes you to a secret room. Just when the elevator arrives, to the side you will find this Amulet.

187.name: Hallowed Egg
187.description: Spending at least 30% of a Firearm's magazine to deal damage increases Melee damage by 10% for 7s. Stacks 5x.

188.name: Talisman of the Sun
188.description: Increases FIRE damage by 20% and BURNING damage by 50%.
188.unlock: Inside a chest by a statue

189.name: Stalkers Brand
189.description: Gain 10% Ranged and 15% Melee damage. Bonus doubles versus enemies not targeting wearer.

190.name: Inert Overcharger
190.description: Standing still increases Fire Rate by 20%, Reload Speed by 15%, and reduces Reeoil by 50%. Lasts 1.5s after moving.

191.name: Difference Engine
191.description: While a Shield is active, gain 20% damage and 1.5% of base damage dealt as Lifesteal.
191.unlock: From the coffins in the ground using the big facility you need to power first the Dark Conduit area.

192.name: Scavenger's Bauble
192.description: Increases Scrap pickups by 50%. Automatically pick up any nearby crafting materials.

193.name: Matriarch's Insignia
193.description: Increases Melee Damage by 35% and causes all sucesful Melee Attacks to restore 10 Stamina.
193.unlock: You need to open a door with a key you will find behind a waterfall

194.name: Gunslinger's Charm
194.description: Increases Fire Rate by 15% and Reload Speed by 20%.
194.unlock: Exahust dialoge with Mudtooth after finishing the second world

195.name: Weightless Weight
195.description: Increases Movement Speed by 0.75% and reduces Stamina Cost of all actions by 0.75% for every 5 points of Armor Encumbrance.

196.name: Indignant Fetish
196.description: Taking damage from enemies increases all damage dealt by 25% and reduces all incoming damage by 10%. Lasts 20s.

197.name: Spirit Wisp Amulet
197.description: Activating a Mod reduces current Skill Cooldowns by 3% for every 300 Mod Power spent.
197.unlock: Get the whisp and progress through the dungeon till the beginning.

198.name: Golden Ribbon
198.description: Increases Mod damage by 25%. Activating a Mod grants HASTE for 15s.
198.unlock: Use the Plain Ribbon on a statue with two figures holding hands, complete the quest in the area to get it.

199.name: Rusted Navigator's Pendant
199.description: Grants 15 Health, 15 Stamina and -15 Armor Encumbrance

200.name: Laemir Censer
200.description: Increases Mod Duration by 50%. Increases Mod Cost by 15%
200.unlock: Exahust every dialoge with the Pan you rescue in the boss fight with Defiler.

201.name: Soul Anchor
201.description: Summoning increases all damage dealt by 20% for 30s.

202.name: Ankh of Power
202.description: Grants 15% increase to all damage. Consuming a Relic doubles the bonus for 15s.

203.name: Dying Ember
203.description: Gain 5% of base Melee damage dealt as Lifesteal

204.name: Abrasive Whetstone
204.description: When attacking a BLEEDING enemy, Crit Chance is increased by 15% and Crit Damage is increased by 30%.

205.name: Broken Pocket Watch
205.description: Increases Stamina Regen by 25 and reduces Stamina cost by 50%

206.name: Butcher's Fetish
206.description: Increases Critical Chance by 15% and Critical Damage by 25% for 15s after striking enemy with a Charged Melee Attack.

207.name: Chains of Amplification
207.description: Increases all damage dealt to targets suffering from a Status Effect by 20%.

208.name: Cleansing Stone
208.description: Reduces Duration of Elemental Status Effects against wearer by 50%. Relic use cleanses Elemental Status effects and grants 15% of wearers Max Health to all allies within 7m when cleansed.

209.name: Core Booster
209.description: Increases weakspot damage by 50% for 10s after killing an enemy.

210.name: Daredevil Charm
210.description: Gain 7.5% to all damage dealt, 3% Movement Speed, and 5% all damage taker' for each piece of unequipped armor.

211.name: Death's Embrace
211.description: Gain 20% to all damage when Health is below 100%. Gain HASTE when below 50% Health.
211.unlock: Buy from Bedel of the Vaunnt 1000 Scrap

212.name: Decayed Margin
212.description: Melee hits gain 1.5% base damage dealt as Lifesteal. For each 25% missing Health, gain 1.5% additional Melee Lifesteal. When Health is full, gain 25% Melee Damage.

213.name: Detonation Trigger
213.description: Increases Explosion damage by 25%. Explosions apply 405 BURNING damage over 5s.
213.unlock: In a giant piston there is a hole, crouch and go underneath to get in the hole before it hits you. Go inside this tunnel to the end of it, you'll find Amulet item near a cliff.

214.name: Effigy Pendant
214.description: While Grey Healt is presetn, gain 15% to all damage dealt, 10% damage reduction and 1 addional hit before Grey Health is removed.

215.name: Effluvium Enhancer
215.description: Increases ACID damage by 20% and CORROSIVE damage by 50%.
215.unlock: Buy at the Drzyr Replicator. 15 Iron, 1000 Scrap

216.name: Energized Neck Coil
216.description: Increases Status Effect damage by 25%. Applying a damaging Status Effect creates a 5m Explosion for 20% of the Status Effects full damage.

217.name: Energy Diverter
217.description: While a SHIELD is active, gain 10 Critical Chance and 15% to all damage dealt.
217.unlock: Buy at the Drzyr Replicator. 15 Forged Iron, 1000 Scrap

218.name: Escalation Protocol
218.description: Increases all damage dealt by 2.5% for 10s after killing an enemy. Stacks 10x. Dealing damage refreshes the timer.

219.name: Full Moon Circlet
219.description: Ranged damage Lifesteals 3% of base damage dealt. At full health, damage is increases by 20%.
219.unlock: Inside a hidden room below a pitfall trap

220.name: Hyperconductor
220.description:
Gain double Skill Charges. Increases Skill Cooldowns by 50% and reduces Max Power Generation by 15%.
For Heavy Weapons, doubles Heavy Weapon Ammo instead.

221.name: Insulation Driver
221.description: While BULWARK is active, gain 15% to all damage dealt and HASTE.

222.name: Jester's Bell
222.description: Increases Mod and Skill Cast Speed by 35%. Casting a Skill or Mod increases all damage by 20% for 15s.

223.name: Kinetic Shield Exchanger
223.description: While a SHIELD is active, gain 25% Mod damage and generate 15% additional Mod power.

224.name: Kuri Kuri Charm
224.description: For every 10% of Health missing (Max 50%), gain 10% increased Relic Use Speed and 7% chance to not consume a Relic Charge.

225.name: Navigator's Pendant
225.description: Grants 20 Health, 20 Stamina, and -10 Armor Encumbrance.
225.unlock: Chose to live forever while wearing the navigator's Pendant at the world boss

226.name: Neckbone Necklace
226.description: Reduces the Damage of Status Effects applied to wearer by 50%. Gain 25% increased Damage when suffering from a Status Effect or Blight.
226.unlock:
After using the Ravenous Medallion to open the locked door, you will find a lonely creature sitting on a table filled with rotten food. This will bestow the RAVENOUS status effect on your character.
He will ask you to take part on the feast. Eat any meal served, and the event will begin. Fae of many types will spawn in the room and you will have to defeat them.
Once you are done with the Fae waves, the event ends and the host regains consciousness.

227.name: Necklace of Flowing Life
227.description: Increases Grey Health conversion by an additional 100%. When Grey Health Conversion triggers, gain 5x the amount as Mod Power.

228.name: Necklace of Supremacy
228.description: After 7s of not being damaged, increases all damage dealt by 15%. Incrfases to 25% if Health is full.

229.name: Nightweaver's Grudge
229.description: Gain 20% Critical Chance and HASTE when within 15m of an entity suffering from a Status Effect.

230.name: Nimue's Ribbon
230.description: Increase Relic Healing Effectiveness by 50% Activating a Relic grants HASTE for 25s.
230.unlock: Crafted at Nimue with Faelin's Sigil and Faerin's Sigil

231.name: One True King Sigil
231.description: Increases Mod damage by 20%. Enhances the effect of Faerin's Sigil and Faelin's Sigil by 50% per Sigil equipped.

232.name: One-Eyed Joker Idol
232.description: Neutral Backdash creates a Magic Card lasting 1s. If Card absorbs enemy damage gain 25% Critical Chance for 5s. Neutral Backdash cost 30% additional Stamina.

233.name: Range Finder
233.description: After killing an enemy, gain 10% Ranged damage and 2m Firearm Range. Stacks 3x Lasts 10s. ranged Weakspot Hits will refresh duration.
233.unlock: Crafted at Drzyr Replicator. 15 Galvanized Iron, 1000 Scrap

234.name: Ravager's Mark
234.description: Increases all damage dealt to BLEEDING targets by 20%. Bonus increases to 30% for targets with 50% or lower Health.

235.name: Red Doe Sigil
235.description: Increases Relic Healing Effectiveness by 30% which doubles when the wearer's Health is below 50%.

236.name: Shaed Bloom Crystal
236.description: Gain a 30% damage bonus. Every 5s, the bonus switches between Physical and Elemental damage.

237.name: Shock Devide
237.description: Increases SHOCK damage by 20% and OVERLOADED damage by 50%.
237.unlock: In the basement of the Asylum, enter the first room on the right. Crouch through a small gap. You will find a note and the amulet.

238.name: Silver Ribbon
238.description: Increases Skill damage by 25%. Activating a SKILL grants HASTE for 15s.
238.unlock: Use the Plain Ribbon on a statue with two figures holding hands, defeat Faelin to get the Silver Ribbon (Otherwise will be the Golden Ribbon).

239.name: Toxic Release Valve
239.description:
Swapping off an empty Firearm releases a Toxic Cloud, which deals 148.5 ACID Damage to all enemies within 7m. and applies CORROSION. 
Can only happen once every 3s.

240.name: Twisted Idol
240.description: Increases Armor Effectiveness by 30% and reduces Encumbrance by 15.

241.name: Vengance Idol
241.description: Increases all damage dealt by 30% when the wearer's Health is below 50%.

242.name: Void Idol
242.description: Increases Reload Speed by 20%. Reloads only require 50% of magazine from reserves to fully reload.
242.unlock: Crafted at Drzyr Replicator. Shinning Essence Echo (Dropped by Tal Ratha both forms, 15 Hardened Iron, 1000 Scrap

243.name: Deceiver's Band
243.description: After performing a Slide, gain 15% Evade Speed and 10% Movement Speed for 12s.

244.name: Worn Admiral's Ring
244.description: All Damage received is increased by 200%. All damage dealt is increased by 10%.
244.unlock: Buy from Reggie at Ward 13 for 500 Scrap

245.name: Fire Stone
245.description: Increases FIRE damage by 10% and FIRE Resistance by 15.
245.unlock: Buy from Reggie at Ward 13 for 500 Scrap

246.name: Acid Stone
246.description: Increases ACID damage by 10% and ACID Resistance by 15%.
246.unlock: Buy from Reggie at Ward 13 for 500 Scrap

247.name: Grounding Stone
247.description: Increases SHOCK damage by 10% and SHOCK Resistance by 15
247.unlock: Buy from Reggie at Ward 13 for 500 Scrap

248.name: Anastasija's Inspiration
248.description: When receiven healing effects, gain HASTE for 10s.

249.name: Gunslinger's Ring
249.description: Increases Firearm Swap Speed by 30% and Reload Speed by 10%.

250.name: Blood Jewel
250.description: Charged Melee Attacks apply BLEEDING, dealing 368 BLEED damage over 20s.

251.name: Feedback Loop
251.description: Perfect Dodge triggers a 3m AOE blast that deal 62 SHOCK Damage and applies OVERLOADED.
251.location: Tower of the Unseen / Terminus Station

252.name: Stone of Expanse
252.description: Increases Ranged damage by 12%. Reduces all other damage dealt by 6%.

254.name: Hardcore Metal Band
254.description: Taking damage adds 1 stack of BULWARK which individually falls off after 10s. Max 5 stacks.

255.name: Constant Variable Ring
255.description: Increases Ranged damage up to 20% based on curren Weapon's Overheat value.

256.name: Low Yield Recovery Ring
256.description: Killing an enemy regenerates 5% Max Health over 5s. Additional kills increase duration by 5s. Max 30s.

257.name: Stone of Continuance
257.unlock: Found at the bottom of the tower

258.name: Reserve Boosting Gem
258.description: Increases Health Regeneration by 0.333 per second. 1s after going below 50% Health, increases regeneration value to 2 per second until 50% Health is reached.

259.name: Conservation Seal
259.description: For every 10% Health missing [Max 50%], gain 3% chance to not consume Relic and 5% increased Relic Efficacy on next use.

260.name: Guardian's Ring
260.description: Adds 1 Stack of BULWARK when within 7m of an enemy. Increases to 2 Stacks for 10s after taking Melee damage.
260.location: Forgotten Field / The Expanding Glade / The Nameless Nest

261.name: Soul Link
261.description: Summons Lifesteal 5% of base damage dealt which returns to the wearer as Health.
261.location: The Expanding Glade / The Withering Weald / The Nameless Nest

262.name: Targeting Jewel
262.description: Increases Range on all Firearms by 4m. Reduces Spread by 15%.

263.name: Generating Band
263.description: Regenerate 3% of Max Health per second while a SHIELD is active.

266.name: Ring of Diversion
266.description: Increases invulnerability window while evading and sliding.
266.unlock: inside the tomb past the floating pillar trap. You will need Kolket's Key to open the door, you can find it after solving the Consort's Puzzle.

268.name: Alchemy Stone
268.description: Increases base Lifesteal by 5% while suffering from a negative STATUS or BLIGHT Effect.

269.name: Alumni Ring
269.description: Increases all Elemental damage dealt by 10%.
269.unlock: Outside the Asylum after defeating the Nightweaver

270.name: Shiny Hog Lure
270.description: Reloading grants 25-30 Mod Power to both weapons based on percentage of Magazine reloaded.

271.name: Celerity Stone
271.description: Increases Consumable and Relic Use Speed by 20%.
271.location: The Twisted Chantry / The Far Woods / The Lament

272.name: Vestige of Power
272.description: After 7s of not being damaged, increases Ranged and Melee Damage by 10%.

273.name: Ring of the Forest Spirit
273.description: Relic Healing Effectiveness is increased by 15%.

274.name: Heart of the Wolf
274.description: Increases Max Stamina by 25 and Movement Speed by 10%.

275.name: Hardened Coil
275.description: Reduces all incoming damage by 3% for each 10% of missing Health. Max 15% reduction.

276.name: Assasin's Seal
276.description: Reduces enemy Awareness Range by 25%. Increases all damage dealt to enemies not targeting wearer by 10%.
276.unlock: Inside the mirror side of the council. Change the keys to match the colors on the mirror floor.

279.name: Lithic Signet
279.location: The Chimney / The Twisted Chantry / The Lament
279.unlock: Shot the crystal eyes from the 4 statues.

280.name: Akari War Band
280.description: Perfect Dodges increase Critical Chance by 15% and Critical Damage by 15% for 15s.

281.name: Amber Moonstone
281.description: When the wearer's Health drops below 30%, all incoming damage is reduced by 25% and wearer becomes immune to Temporary Status Effects.

282.name: Archer's Crest
282.description: Increases Projectile Speed by 20% and Decreases Weapon Charge Time by 25%.

283.name: Band Band
283.description: Icreases Speed of Revive and being Revived by 35%. Increases Downed Health and Downed Movement Speed by 100%.

284.name: Berserker's Crest
284.description: Increases Melee Charge Speed by 20% and reduces Melee Stamina Cost by 25%.

285.name: Black Pawn Stamp
285.unlock: In a large rectangular room there are blue and white torches, change the colors shooting them until all are blue.

286.name: Blacout Ring
286.description: After dealing 20% of the Weapon's Total Magazine base damage, increases Reload Speed by 3%. Stacks 5x Cleared on Reload.

287.name: Blasting Cap Ring
287.unlock: There's a giant piston hitting the ground, you may hear it the pounding from far away. Get to the piston, time it well, crouch and go underneath it and get to a hole below it before it hits you.

288.name: Blessed Ring
288.description: After receiving a benefit from a Relic, gain BULWARK L2 for 15s.

289.name: Blood Tinged Ring
289.description: Gain 1 Health Regeneration per second when within 10m of a BLEEDING entity.

290.name: Braided Thorns
290.description: After killing an enemy, gain 15% increased Critical Chance for 10s.

291.name: Burden of the Audacious
291.description: Decreases all healing by 75%. Perfect Dodges heal for 15% of Max Health.

292.name: Burden of the Destroyer
292.description: Decreases Ideal Range of all Firearms by 25%. Increases all damage dealt by 15%.

293.name: Burden of the Divine
293.description: All damage dealt by wearer is reduced by 10%. 50% of self healing applies to allies.

294.name: Burden of the Follower
294.description: Reduces Fire Rate by 15%. Increases Mod Power Generation by 50%.

295.name: Burden of the Gambler
295.description: Disables Weakspots. Increases Critical Chance by 10% and Critical Damage by 20%.

296.name: Burden of the Mariner
296.description: Increases Skill Cooldowns by 25%. Generate 10% additional Mod Power for each Skill on Cooldown.
296.unlock: Crafted at Drzyr Replicator. 10 Iron, 500 Scrap

297.name: Burden fo the Warlock
297.description: Reduces Mod Power Requirement by X ...Activating a Mod costs 15% Health as C... Activation cannot kill Wearer.

298.name: Burden of the Rebel
298.description: Reduces Skill Cooldowns by 15% but reduces Relic Use Speed by 25%.
298.unlock: Give the Thaen Seed to the Eternal Empress. The seed is inside the Ornate Lockbox which you need the Ornate Key, both found in Yaesha - The Widow's Court

299.name: Burden of the Stargazer
299.description: Reduces Skill Cooldowns by 15%. Activating a Skill costs 15% Health.

300.name: Fae Shaman Ring
300.description: Increases Health Regeneration by 0.25 and Relic Use Speed by 25%.

301.name: Ring of Grace
301.description: Taking enemy damage causes 10% of Maximum Health to regenerate over 10s.
301.unlock: Give Dria's Anklet to the man near the World Stone. To get Dria's anklet you need to defeat Barghest the Vile that hides in the bone piles.

302.name: Ring of the Robust
302.description: Increases Max Health by 10 and Armor by 15.

303.name: Timekeeper's Jewel
303.description: Increases duration of all Status Effects applied by the wearer. Duration varies per Status
303.unlock: At the top of the clock tower inside a chest.

304.name: Fae Bruiser Ring
304.description: Dealing Melee damage grants 2 Stacks of BULWARK for 7s. Does no stack with itself.

305.name: White Pawn Stamp
305.unlock: In a large rectangular room there are blue and white torches, change the colors shooting them until all are white.

306.name: Stream Coupler
306.description: Using a Skill regenerates 10% of Max Health over 5s.

307.name: Stockpile Charger
307.description: Ater picking up ammo, increases the damage of that Ammo Type by 13% for 20s.

308.name: Outcast Ring
308.description: Increases Reload Speed by 5% for 15s after reloading. Stacks 5x.
308.unlock: Give the Spirit Whisp Amulet to the man in the sewers.

309.name: Ring of the Damned
309.description: Increase all damage dealt by 10% while Grey Health is present.
309.unlock: Shoot the hand of a man hanging out with a purple shine, then interact with the severed hand.

311.name: Encrypted Ring
311.description: Using a Mod regenerates 10% of Max health over 10s. Can stack up to 30s.

312.name: Dense Silicon Ring
312.description: Gain 200% of Health Regenerated as Mod Power.

313.name: Ring of Restocking
313.description: Reloads within 1.5s of a Critical Kill or Weakspot Kill are 20% faster.

314.name: Vacuum Seal
314.description: Increases Automatic Pickup Range for Scrap by 100%. Picking up Scrap, Iron or Ammo grants a Shield for 10% of Max Health for 10s. Does not stack.
314.location: Phantom Wasteland / Tower of the Unseen

315.name: Momentum Driver
315.description: Ater Sprinting for 2s, Movement Speed is increased by 15% and Stagger Level reduced by 1.

316.name: Defensive Action Loop
316.description: While reloading, and for 3s after reload completes, incoming damage is reduced by 10%.

317.name: Galvanized Resupply Band
317.unlock: From the coffins in the ground using the big facility you need to power first the Dark Conduit area.

319.name: Soul Guard
319.description: Gain a stack of BULWARK for each active Summon.
319.unlock: Buy from Bloodmoon Altar for 5 Blood Moon Essence

320.name: Slayer's Crest
320.description: Increases Melee damage by 25% when attacking enemies from behind
320.unlock: Take the elevator and inside the chest

321.name: Reapling Stone
321.description: After an Elemental Status Effect is removed from wearer, they become immune to all Elemental Status Effects and gain 2% base of damage dealt as Lifesteal fo 10s

322.name: Flyweight's Sting
322.description: Increases Melee damage while Armor Encumbrance is below 50. Damage bonus increases with lower Encumbrance, up to 25% at 0 Weight.

323.name: Kinetic Cycle Stone
323.description: Increases Mod adn Skill Cast Speed by 20%

324.name: Captain's Insignia
324.description: Increases Revive Speed and Relic Consume Speed by 25% per downed or dead ally. Max 2 stacks.

325.name: Cataloger's Jewel
325.description: Automatically generates 8 Mod Power per second.

326.name: Compulsion Loop
326.description: After killing an enemy, gain 5% Fire Rate and Melee Attack Speed for 7s. Stacks 3x.

328.name: Deceiver's Band
328.description: After performing a Slide, gain 15% Evade Speed and 10% Movement Speed for 12s.

329.name: Downgraded Ring
329.description: Receive 5% less damage for each negative status the attacker is suffering from, Max 4stacks.

330.name: Drakestone Pearl
330.description: Enables Stamina Regeneration during Melee Attacks at 20% of the normal rate.

331.name: Dran Memento
331.description: Increases Max Stamina by 20 and reduces Encumbrance by 5.
331.unlock: Saving the Dran in The Burning Event.

332.name: Dread Font
332.description: Increases Grey Health Regeneration rate by 2 per second.

333.name: Dying Ember
333.description: Gain 5% of base Melee damage dealt as Lifesteal.

334.name: Endaira's Endless Loop
334.description: After Sprinting for 2s, the wearer gains 1.5 Health Regeneration per second until they stop Sprinting.

335.name: Excess Coil
335.description: Activating a Skill grants a Shield for 25% of Max Health. Cannot stack with itself. Lasts 10s.

337.name: Fae Protector Signet
337.description: Increases Max Health and Stamina by 10 and Reduces Encumbrance by 5.
337.unlock: Defeat all members of the Council

339.name: Faelin's Sigil
339.description: Critical and Weak Spot Hits generate 10% additional Mod Power.
339.unlock: Given by Faelin if you kill Faerin and report to him

340.name: Faerin's Sigil
340.description: Critical and Weakspot Hits generates 10% additional Mod Power.
340.unlock: Given by Faerin if you kill Faelin and report to him

342.name: Focused Jewel
342.description: Continuously Aiming Down Sights reduces Recoil by 25% and gradually reduces Spread up to 35% over 3.5s.

343.name: Frivolous Band
343.description: Increases Evade Speed by 10%. Perfect Evades increase Fire Rate by 10% and Melee Speed by 10% for 10s.

344.name: Game Master's Pride
344.description: Reduces all healing by 50%. Splits all damage and remaining healing evenly amoung all allies wearing this ring.

345.name: Haymaker's Ring
345.description: Increase Melee damage by 0.2% for every 1 points of Armor Encumbrance.

346.name: Hex Ward
346.unlock: Crafted by Nimue for 5 Lumenite Crystal

347.name: Lodestone Ring
347.description: Increases all damage dealt against illuminated enemies by 5%.
347.unlock: Rewarded by Bedel of the Vaunnt if the players talks to him while wearing the Lodestone Crown after defeating the Ravager.

348.name: Mechanic's Cog
348.description: While carrying an Engineer Heavy Weapon, gain 15% Movement Speed and 1s BULWARK

349.name: Metal Driver
349.description: Killing Blows increase Reload Speed by 5% for 7s. Stacks 3x.

350.name: Meteorite Shard Ring
350.description: Increases Encumbrance by 50. Increases Unarmed damage by 50%.
350.unlock: Crafted by Drzyr Replicator for 10 Iron, 750 Scrap

351.name: Microcompressor
351.description: Reduces Heat Generation when firing weapons that Overheat by -30%. Increases Heat Reduction Rate by 30%.
351.unlock: Crafted by Drzyr Replicator for 10 Forged Iron, 750 Scrap

352.name: Point Focus Ring
352.description: Reduces Initial Spread and Recoil by 35%.

353.name: Power Saver
353.description: At Max Health, gain a 25% chance to not use a Relic charge.

354.name: Propulsion Loop
354.description: After killing an enemy, increases Movement Speed by 5% and Consumable Use Speed by 10% for 10s. Stacks 3x.

355.name: Rerouting Cable
355.description: Gain 5% of Max Health as a SHIELD for 5s after spending 25 Stamina. Accumulation resets after 5s of inaction. Max 50% SHIELD.

356.name: Restriction Cord
356.description: Restricts the wearer from Healing above 50% of their Max Health and reduces all incoming damage by 10%.
356.unlock: Buy from Bedel of the Vaunnt

357.name: Ring of Crisis
357.description: When wearer's Health drops below 25%, gain a Shield for 25% of Max Health. Lasts 10s.

358.name: Ring of Deflection
358.description: Direct Damage against wearer has a 20% Chance to be converted entirely to Grey Health.

359.name: Ring of the Flawed Beauty
359.description: Ranged Weakspot damage is increased by 25%. Ranged damage is reduced by 15% when failing to hit a Weakspot.

360.name: Ring of Omens
360.description: Evades cost 15% Max Health as Grey Health instead of Stamina.

361.name: Ring of Retribution
361.description: Incoming enemy damage increases Reload Speed and all outgoing damage by 10%. Lasts 15s.

362.name: Rock of Anguish
362.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed and 7.5% Reload Speed for every 25% of Max Health missing.

363.name: Rotward
363.unlock: Buy from Bedel of the Vaunnt

364.name: Rusted Heirloom
364.description: Grants 2 Stacks of BULWARK below 50% Max HP.
364.unlock: Inside a Safe (3581). The code could be found using your flashlight to lit the numbers in the area.

365.name: Sapphire Dreamstone
365.description: Critical Hits reduce Skill Cooldowns by 3%. Can only happen once every 2s.
365.unlock: You have to take the secret passage in The Executioner Event. To enter this event you need to shoot a painting that you find when your character says "something's odd

366.name: Seal of the Empress
366.description: Increases Max Health by 20. Reduces Max Stamina by 10.

367.name: Singed Ring
367.description: Increases all damage dealt to BURNING enemies by 10%.

368.name: Stone of Malevolence
368.description: Elemental Status damage generates 15% additional Mod Power.

369.name: Suppression Wand
369.unlock: Crafted by Drzyr Replicator for 5 Iron, 250 Scrap

370.name: Tarnished Ring
370.description: Increases damage of Unarmed Attacks by 30%.

371.name: Tear of Kaeula
371.description: Increases Relic capacity by 2 while equipped

372.name: Tempest Conduit
372.description: After receiving Elemental Damage, increases all damage dealt by 10% and Resistance to the received Element by 20 for 20s.

373.name: Tightly Wound Coil
373.description: When spending 75% or more of current magazine, gain a SHIELD of 10% of Max Health for 5s. Does not stack with itself.

374.name: Tomb Dweller's Ring
374.description: Increases Movement Speed by 10% for 7s after Vaulting, Climbing, Leaping, and entering Water, stacks 1x. Reduces Fall Damage by 25%.

375.name: Wax Sealed Ring
375.description: Killing blows increase Ranged and Melee Damage by 4% for 15s. Stacks 3x.
375.location: The Far Woods / The Forbudden Grove

377.name: Zania's Malice
377.description: Dealing Weakspot damage increases Weakspot damage by 10% for 7s. Stacks 3x.
